00039 class Blacklists extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'blacklists';
00042     
00043     function Blacklists()
00044     {
00045         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('You can search categories on this page.');
00046     }
00047     
00048     function FormatLogCols(&$cols)
00049     {
00050         $link= 'http://'.$cols['Site'];
00051         $cols['Site']= '<a href="'.$link.'">'.wordwrap($cols['Site'], 100, '<br />', TRUE).'</a>';
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 $View= new Blacklists();

00061 function PrintSiteCategorySearchForm($site)
00062 {
00063     ?>
00064     <table>
00065         <tr>
00066             <td>
00067                 <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00068                     <?php echo _TITLE('Search site').': ' ?>
00069                     <input type="text" name="SearchSite" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="100" value="<?php echo $site ?>"/>
00070                     <input type="submit" name="Search" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Search') ?>"/>
00071                 </form>
00072             </td>
00073             <td>
00074                 <?php
00075                 PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2('Here you can search sites and urls in category listings. Regexp below can help you further refine your search.'));
00076                 ?>
00077             </td>
00078         </tr>
00079     </table>
00080     <?php
00081 }

00087 function AppendCatsDescTable(&$msg)
00088 {
00089     $catdescs= array(
00090         'ads'               =>  _HELPWINDOW('Advert servers and banned URLs'),
00091         'adult'             =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites containing adult material such as swearing but not porn'),
00092         'aggressive'        =>  _HELPWINDOW('Similar to violence but more promoting than depicting'),
00093         'antispyware'       =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites that remove spyware'),
00094         'artnudes'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Art sites containing artistic nudity'),
00095         'audio-video'       =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with audio or video downloads'),
00096         'banking'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Banking websites'),
00097         'beerliquorinfo'    =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with information only on beer or liquors'),
00098         'beerliquorsale'    =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with beer or liquors for sale'),
00099         'cellphones'        =>  _HELPWINDOW('stuff for mobile/cell phones'),
00100         'chat'              =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with chat rooms etc'),
00101         'childcare'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites to do with childcare'),
00102         'clothing'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about and selling clothing'),
00103         'culnary'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about cooking et al'),
00104         'dating'            =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about dating'),
00105         'desktopsillies'    =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites containing screen savers, backgrounds, cursers, pointers. desktop themes and similar timewasting and potentially dangerous content'),
00106         'dialers'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with dialers such as those for pornography or trojans'),
00107         'drugs'             =>  _HELPWINDOW('Drug related sites'),
00108         'ecommerce'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites that provide online shopping'),
00109         'entertainment'     =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites that promote movies, books, magazine, humor'),
00110         'frencheducation'   =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites to do with french education'),
00111         'gambling'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Gambling sites including stocks and shares'),
00112         'gardening'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Gardening sites'),
00113         'government'        =>  _HELPWINDOW('Military and schools etc'),
00114         'hacking'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Hacking/cracking information'),
00115         'homerepair'        =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about home repair'),
00116         'hygiene'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about hygiene and other personal grooming related stuff'),
00117         'instantmessaging'  =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites that contain messenger client download and web-based messaging sites'),
00118         'jewelry'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about and selling jewelry'),
00119         'jobsearch'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites for finding jobs'),
00120         'kidstimewasting'   =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites kids often waste time on'),
00121         'mail'              =>  _HELPWINDOW('Webmail and email sites'),
00122         'naturism'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites that contain nude pictures and/or promote a nude lifestyle'),
00123         'news'              =>  _HELPWINDOW('News sites'),
00124         'onlineauctions'    =>  _HELPWINDOW('Online auctions'),
00125         'onlinegames'       =>  _HELPWINDOW('Online gaming sites'),
00126         'onlinepayment'     =>  _HELPWINDOW('Online payment sites'),
00127         'personalfinance'   =>  _HELPWINDOW('Personal finance sites'),
00128         'pets'              =>  _HELPWINDOW('Pet sites'),
00129         'phishing'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites attempting to trick people into giving out private information.'),
00130         'porn'              =>  _HELPWINDOW('Pornography'),
00131         'proxy'             =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with proxies to bypass filters'),
00132         'radio'             =>  _HELPWINDOW('non-news related radio and television'),
00133         'religion'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites promoting religion'),
00134         'ringtones'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites containing ring tones, games, pictures and other'),
00135         'searchengines'     =>  _HELPWINDOW('Search engines such as google'),
00136         'sexuality'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites dedicated to sexuality, possibly including adult material'),
00137         'sportnews'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sport news sites'),
00138         'sports'            =>  _HELPWINDOW('All sport sites'),
00139         'spyware'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites who run or have spyware software to download'),
00140         'updatesites'       =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites where software updates are downloaded from including virus sigs'),
00141         'vacation'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites about going on holiday'),
00142         'violence'          =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites containing violence'),
00143         'virusinfected'     =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites who host virus infected files'),
00144         'warez'             =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites with illegal pirate software'),
00145         'weather'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Weather news sites and weather related'),
00146         'weapons'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Sites detailing or selling weapons'),
00147         'webmail'           =>  _HELPWINDOW('Just webmail sites'),
00148         'whitelist'         =>  _HELPWINDOW('Contains site specifically 100% suitable for kids'),
00149     );
00150     
00151     $msg.= ''._HELPWINDOW("Although this is called a 'blacklist', the categories can be used as white or grey lists also. Being listed does not infer that the site is bad, these are just lists of sites.\n\n");
00152     
00153     $deschtml= '<table class="table"><tr><th>'._HELPWINDOW('Category').'</th><th>'._HELPWINDOW('Description').'</th></tr>';
00154     foreach ($catdescs as $cat => $desc) {
00155         $deschtml.= "<tr><td id=\"cat\">$cat</td><td id=\"catdesc\">$desc</td></tr>";
00156     }
00157     $deschtml.= "</table>";
00158 
00159     $msg.= $deschtml;
00160 }

00162 $LogFile= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LogFile'];
00163 $SearchSite= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['SearchSite'];
00164 
00165 if ($_POST['SearchSite']) {
00166     $SearchSite= $_POST['SearchSite'];
00167     $_SESSION[$View->Model]['SearchSite']= $SearchSite;
00168     
00169     if ($View->Controller($Output, 'SearchSite', $SearchSite)) {
00170         $LogFile= $Output[0];
00171         $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LogFile']= $LogFile;
00172     }
00173 }
00174 
00175 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00176         
00177 PrintSiteCategorySearchForm($SearchSite);
00178 
00179 if ($LogFile) {
00180     ProcessStartLine($StartLine);
00181     UpdateLogsPageSessionVars($LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp);
00182 
00184     $View->Controller($Output, 'GetFileLineCount', $LogFile, $SearchRegExp);
00185     $LogSize= $Output[0];
00186 
00187     ProcessNavigationButtons($LinesPerPage, $LogSize, $StartLine, $HeadStart);
00188 
00189     PrintLogHeaderForm($StartLine, $LogSize, $LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp, $CustomHiddenInputs);
00190     ?>
00191     <table id="logline">
00192         <?php
00193         PrintTableHeaders($View->Model);
00194         ?>
00195         <?php
00196         $View->Controller($Output, 'GetLogs', $LogFile, $HeadStart, $LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp);
00197         $Logs= unserialize($Output[0]);
00198 
00199         $LineCount= $StartLine + 1;
00200         foreach ($Logs as $Log) {
00201             $View->PrintLogLine($Log, $LineCount++);
00202         }
00203         ?>
00204     </table>
00205     <?php
00206 }
00207 AppendCatsDescTable($View->ConfHelpMsg);
00208 
00209 PrintHelpWindow($View->ConfHelpMsg);
00210 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
00211 ?>
